DOC.brief_summary: Stress contributes to health and behavioral issues in students, but will not be integrated into schools without evidence of benefit. This study was conducted to determine if a 6-week relaxation response (RR) curriculum improves cognitive performance in ninth grade students.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Relaxation Response Training on Declarative Memory and Learning in High School Students
DOC.detailed_description: Stress contributes to health and behavioral issues in students, but will not be integrated into schools without evidence of benefit. This study was conducted to determine if a 6-week relaxation response (RR) curriculum improves cognitive performance in ninth grade students.
DOC.criteria: a member of 9th grade at a residential preparatory school.
